languages.text: Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} начать операцию стремительным броском всех основных сил, враг был рассредоточен, и не все отряды Несущих Слово успели отступить к Машинному храму. Они были рассеяны по полю боя и не могли ударить единым ударным кулаком. Это давало нам шанс окружить и задавить их отряды поодиночке.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} начать операцию стремительным броском всех основных сил, враг был рассредоточен, и не все отряды Несущих Слово успели отступить к Машинному храму. Они были рассеяны по полю боя и не могли выступить единым ударным кулаком. Мы могли попытаться задавить их числом, взяв огонь на себя в прямом столкновении.

languages.text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.
languages.original_text: Благодаря тому, что Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} начать операцию стремительным броском всех основных сил, враг был рассредоточен, и не все отряды Несущих Слово успели отступить к Машинному храму. Они были рассеяны по полю боя и не могли ударить единым ударным кулаком. Это давало нам шанс окружить и задавить их отряды поодиночке.

traits.locale_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

languages.text: 舰长大人命令所有主力部队抓紧时机，以迅雷不及掩耳之势开始行动。敌人仍然处于混乱状态，而且并非所有的怀言者小队都来得及在机械大教堂进行集结。这群敌人分散在战场各处，无法进行统一反击。我们可以抓住这个机会，将敌人的小队逐一包围，各个击溃。
languages.original_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人命令所有主力部队抓紧时机，以迅雷不及掩耳之势开始行动。敌人仍然处于混乱状态，而且并非所有的怀言者小队都来得及在机械大教堂进行集结。这群敌人分散在战场各处，无法进行统一反击。我们可以抓住这个机会，将敌人的小队逐一包围，各个击溃。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ayant donné l'ordre à l'intégralité de nos forces principales d'entamer l'opération par une attaque-éclair, les troupes ennemies étaient toujours en proie à la confusion et les escouades des Word Bearers n'avaient pas toutes eu le temps de rallier la Cathédrale de la Machine. Éparpillées sur le champ de bataille, elles n'étaient pas en mesure de répliquer de façon unifiée, ce qui nous a permis de les encercler une par une pour mieux les écraser.
languages.original_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ayant donné l'ordre à l'intégralité de nos forces principales d'entamer l'opération par une attaque-éclair, les troupes ennemies étaient toujours en proie à la confusion et les escouades des Word Bearers n'avaient pas toutes eu le temps de rallier la Cathédrale de la Machine. Éparpillées sur le champ de bataille, elles n'étaient pas en mesure de répliquer de façon unifiée, ce qui nous a permis de les encercler une par une pour mieux les écraser.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが主力部隊の総力を挙げて迅速な攻撃を開始するよう命じたため、敵部隊はまだ混乱しており、すべてのワードベアラーの分隊が機械大聖堂で再編成する時間がなかった。奴らは戦場のあちこちに散らばっており、統一した攻撃で報復することはできなかった。そのため、奴らの分隊を包囲し、ひとつひとつ潰していく機会を得た。
languages.original_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが主力部隊の総力を挙げて迅速な攻撃を開始するよう命じたため、敵部隊はまだ混乱しており、すべてのワードベアラーの分隊が機械大聖堂で再編成する時間がなかった。奴らは戦場のあちこちに散らばっており、統一した攻撃で報復することはできなかった。そのため、奴らの分隊を包囲し、ひとつひとつ潰していく機会を得た。

languages.text: Como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán había ordenado a todas nuestras fuerzas iniciar la operación con un ataque relámpago, las tropas enemigas seguían desorganizadas y no todas las escuadras de Portadores de la Palabra habían podido reagruparse en la Catedral Máquina. Estaban dispersos por el campo de batalla y no podían coordinar un contraataque unido. Esto nos dio la ocasión de rodearlos y aplastar sus fuerzas de una en una.
languages.original_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

traits.locale_text: Como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán había ordenado a todas nuestras fuerzas iniciar la operación con un ataque relámpago, las tropas enemigas seguían desorganizadas y no todas las escuadras de Portadores de la Palabra habían podido reagruparse en la Catedral Máquina. Estaban dispersos por el campo de batalla y no podían coordinar un contraataque unido. Esto nos dio la ocasión de rodearlos y aplastar sus fuerzas de una en una.

languages.text: Weil der Lord Captain unserem gesamten Haupttrupp befohlen hatte, die Operation mit einem schnellen Angriff zu beginnen, herrschte in den Reihen des Feindes noch immer Chaos. Nicht alle Truppen der Word Bearers hatten die Zeit gehabt, sich in der Maschinenkathedrale zu sammeln. Sie waren auf dem Schlachtfeld verstreut und konnten nicht zu einem vereinten Gegenschlag ansetzen. Das gab uns die Gelegenheit, ihre Trupps einen nach dem anderen zu umzingeln und auszulöschen.
languages.original_text: Because the Lord Captain ordered the entirety of our main forces to begin the operation with a swift assault, the enemy troops were still in disarray, and not all Word Bearers squads had had the time to regroup at the Machine Cathedral. They were scattered around the battlefield and could not retaliate with a unified strike. This gave us a chance to surround and crush their squads one by one.

traits.locale_text: Weil der Lord Captain unserem gesamten Haupttrupp befohlen hatte, die Operation mit einem schnellen Angriff zu beginnen, herrschte in den Reihen des Feindes noch immer Chaos. Nicht alle Truppen der Word Bearers hatten die Zeit gehabt, sich in der Maschinenkathedrale zu sammeln. Sie waren auf dem Schlachtfeld verstreut und konnten nicht zu einem vereinten Gegenschlag ansetzen. Das gab uns die Gelegenheit, ihre Trupps einen nach dem anderen zu umzingeln und auszulöschen.
